tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  appointment_time TIME,
  consultation_reason VARCHAR(255),
  doctor_id INT,
  follow_up BOOL
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  doctor_id INT,
  appointment_type VARCHAR(50),
  status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE follow_up_appointments (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  appointment_id INT,
  followup_date DATE,
  followup_notes TEXT,
  followup_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    appointment_date TIMESTAMP,
    doctor_id INT,
    consultation_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100),
    patient_age INT,
    patient_gender CHAR(1),
    patient_contact VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    scheduled_date DATE,
    appointment_type VARCHAR(50),
    doctor_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
    patient_age INT,
    patient_contact VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE consultations (
    consultation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    appointment_id INT,
    doctor_id INT,
    consultation_date DATE,
    diagnosis TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE follow_up (
    followup_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    appointment_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    followup_date DATE,
    followup_notes TEXT,
    followup_status VARCHAR(20)
);
